channel.title: Need help with basic stuff
channel.description:
been a while since i alst coded, how do i change the location of when people login, die, and also how do i change equipment, stats and quest completion upon login.
i am using deltascape source. thanks.

item.title: Need help with basic stuff
item.dc:creator: @trevor267 trevor267
item.description:
@trevor267 wrote:

thanks, got it all, now what file do go into to change magic tele locations :O?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with basic stuff
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

player.java

search initial and your starting coords should be there.

and like 'Rich said where you die may be in your youdied method.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with basic stuff
item.dc:creator: @trevor267 trevor267
item.description:
@trevor267 wrote:

thansk rich, also, how would i make it so when you talk to an npc, it gives 3 different options to click on?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 02, 2008, 09:38:48 pm[/size][hr]er sorry for double post, but i still cant find where to change logon location and death location, idk what u mean by player class

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with basic stuff
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

You can change the starting position in the player class, the coordinates after you have died is most likely located in the youdied method, iâ€™m not sure though.

You also can change the equipment in the player class, along with the quest integers, can be set to 15 by default (completed).

Read full topic
